eu.id3.face

Class License

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.License

  • public class License
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a License object of the Face module.

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public static void activate(java.lang.String hardwareCode,
                            java.lang.String login,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String productReference,
                            java.lang.String commentary,
                            java.lang.String path)
                     throws FaceException
        Retrieves a license file using id3 account credentials and a product reference.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCode - The hardware code on which the license file will be attached, to be retrieved using the GetHostHardwareCode function.
        login - The id3 account login.
        password - The id3 account password.
        productReference - The requested product reference.
        commentary - Commentary associated to this license activation.
        path - Path to the retrieved license file.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • activateActivationKey

        public static void activateActivationKey(java.lang.String hardwareCode,
                                         java.lang.String activationKey,
                                         java.lang.String commentary,
                                         java.lang.String path)
                                  throws FaceException
        Retrieves a license file using an activation key.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCode - The hardware code on which the license file will be attached, to be retrieved using the GetHostHardwareCode function.
        activationKey - The id3 activation key.
        commentary - Commentary associated to this license activation.
        path - Path to the retrieved license file.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • activateActivationKeyBuffer

        public static byte[] activateActivationKeyBuffer(java.lang.String hardwareCode,
                                                 java.lang.String activationKey,
                                                 java.lang.String commentary)
                                          throws FaceException
        Retrieves a license file buffer using an activation key.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCode - The hardware code on which the license file will be attached, to be retrieved using the GetHostHardwareCode function.
        activationKey - The id3 activation key.
        commentary - Commentary associated to this license activation.
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the license data.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • checkModule

        public static void checkModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
                        throws FaceException
        Checks if a module is present in the license. This function checks if a module (defined by his name as a string) is present in a previously loaded license.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - The module name.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • getExpiryDate

        public static java.lang.String getExpiryDate()
                                      throws FaceException
        Retrieves the license expiry date.
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the license expiry date.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • getExternalDriveHardwareCode

        public static java.lang.String getExternalDriveHardwareCode(LicenseHardwareCodeType hardwareCodeType,
                                                            java.lang.String externalDrivePath)
                                                     throws FaceException
        Retrieves the hardware code of the external drive you run the library on. This function works on Windows only.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCodeType - The requested hardware code type. Must be Windows USB.
        externalDrivePath - On Windows to activate a license on a USB device, it must contain the path to the requested USB drive (e.g 'G:\').
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the device hardware code.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • getHostHardwareCode

        public static java.lang.String getHostHardwareCode(LicenseHardwareCodeType hardwareCodeType)
                                            throws FaceException
        Retrieves the hardware code of the device using the requested hardware code type. This function retrieves the hardware code of the device you run the library on. The optional parameter is required: - On Android, it must be the JNIEnv* pointer cast as a void*. - In other cases, it must be set to NULL.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCodeType - The requested hardware code type.
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the device hardware code.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

        Retrieves the hardware code of the previously loaded license file.
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the license file hardware code.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

                                      throws FaceException
        Retrieves the name of a given module in the license.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the module in range [0 ; GetModuleCount() - 1].
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the name.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the requested module.
        Returns:
        Pointer to an int which will contain the requested value.
        Throws:

        public static int getRemainingDays()

        Returns:
        Pointer to an int which will contain the requested remainingDays.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • loadLicense

        public static void loadLicense(java.lang.String licensePath)
                        throws FaceException
        Loads and checks a license from a file. This function does two things: - First it loads the license from a file using the given path - Then it checks the validity of the license regarding the host it is called on (Windows, Linux, Android ...) Calling this function is required to get access to the license member getters. The optional parameter is required on Android and must be the JNIEnv* pointer casted as a void*. It can be set as NULL for other devices.
        Parameters:
        licensePath - Absolute or relative path to the license file.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • loadLicenseBuffer

        public static void loadLicenseBuffer(byte[] licenseData)
                              throws FaceException
        Loads and checks a license from a buffer. This function does two things: - First it loads the license from a buffer - Then it checks the validity of the license regarding the host it is called on (Windows, Linux, Android ...) Calling one of the license loading function is required to get access to all the license member getters. The optional parameter is required on Android and must be the JNIEnv* pointer casted as a void*. It can be set as NULL for other devices.
        Parameters:
        licenseData - A buffer containing the license file data.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • reactivate

        public static void reactivate(java.lang.String hardwareCode,
                              java.lang.String productReference,
                              java.lang.String path)
                       throws FaceException
        Reactivates a license file using hardware code and product reference.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCode - The hardware code on which the license file will be attached, to be retrieved using the GetHostHardwareCode function.
        productReference - The requested product reference.
        path - Path to the retrieved license file.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • reactivateBuffer

        public static byte[] reactivateBuffer(java.lang.String hardwareCode,
                                      java.lang.String productReference)
                               throws FaceException
        Reactivates a license file buffer using hardware code and product reference.
        Parameters:
        hardwareCode - The hardware code on which the license file will be attached, to be retrieved using the GetHostHardwareCode function.
        productReference - The requested product reference.
        Returns:
        Pointer to a pre-allocated buffer to receive the license data.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.
